briefTitle: A Study to Assess the Safety and Efficacy of Risankizumab for Maintenance in Moderate to Severe Plaque Type Psoriasis ( LIMMITLESS )
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Open Label Study to Assess the Safety and Efficacy of Risankizumab for Maintenance in Moderate to Severe Plaque Type Psoriasis (LIMMITLESS)
summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the long-term safety and efficacy of risankizumab in the treatment of moderate to severe chronic plaque psoriasis.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Serious Adverse Events and Non-Serious Adverse Events
